coded_answer.p: Thank you for the letter. I was very pleasepleased when I knew that I had won the first prize. I would like to go there only in July, please. Because, because I have a holiday in July. For accommodation I would rather prefer log cabins because it'sthey isthey are more comfortable than tents. And I don't have to worry about the weather. For two activities, regarding the first one, can I havedo Tennis, please. Because, because I'm very good withat tennis. I used to play a lot when I was a student. TheRegarding the second one, can I havedo Photography, please. Because, because this'sthis is my hobby. And my dad just bought me a new camera. So this'sthis isthis will be my first chance that I can useto use it.

Can you tell me what sort of clothes do I need to bring, please. I'm not sure about the weather in California in the daytime and in the nightimenighttime. And do you have any idea of how much money do I need to bring.?
Thank you very much for your offerringofferingoffer. I hope to hear back from you.

Thanks for the letter asking about athe pop concert. It was really good. I'm glad I went. My responsibilities arewere selling the tickets and making sure that everything iswas rightalright. It was good to work with a lot of people and sharedto share experiences. I met a lot of famous pop bands for the first time. I would feel sad if I didn't gohadn't gone there. They gave me a concert printed T-shirt. I'll show you bymy photographs.

From that time I had a lot of friends also some of them arewere old friends from college. So we are still keep in touch. And the next concert we were promised we'll be there again. I wish you werehad been there with us. Because sometimes you wouldn't have known the experience until you had donehad it.
Any wayAnyway, I will sentsend you some photographs. I hope to hear back from you. Take care and don't work too hard. Please sendgive my love to your family.
